subject: Data
title: Stored Procedures: Code Inside the Database
description: A micro-lesson that makes Stored Procedures: Code Inside the Database usable.

hook.text: Instead of sending 10 queries from your app to the database, you can send one command that runs all 10 inside the database.

buildup.text: Stored procedures are pre-compiled programs stored inside the database that execute complex logic server-side.

discovery.text: They reduce network traffic, improve security by limiting direct table access, and centralize business logic.

options: They reduce network traffic by running logic inside the database
